page.title: 10WORSHIP IN CATTERICK AREA
page.content: The anglican churches of St Anne at Catterick and Holy Trinity church Tunstall along with the Methodist Chapel Catterick are all open for worship. The Methodist Chapel is very poorly supported, only six families worship there, wheras the anglican churches have a healthy congregation whose constant support keeps the buildings in good repair. The worshippers organize fund raising events to keep the churches financially sound and these events are well supported even by non-church goers. There are more intermittent worshippers than regular ones. But it is a caring society, eager to help its neighbours in times of trouble and rejoice with them on happy occassions. Religion is still the backbone of most families way of life.
